title: Planning for a Drink and Dinner
story: Hey! Want to meet for a drink after work? Cool, what time do you finish? Late as always crying Me too. Msg me when you leave OK. Where do you want to go? IDK. I might be hungry tho Good point. I'll think of somewhere to eat.  I know what you're like when you're hungry! wink LOL, I'm not that bad! Don't worry. We can meet at the bus stop and decide then. yes See you later
summary: Two friends plan to meet for a drink after work and discuss where to go for dinner.
image: Two friends sitting at a bar, holding drinks and laughing.
